column4: Hi, the old commands of starting / stoping squid, dhcpd, commands are not wroking in my Natty, even service dhcpd restart or service squid restart is also not working, how to do that in Natty?
bash: /etc/init.d/dhcpd: No such file or directory
do you have dhcpd installed? is it called dhcp?
i showed you DHCP server installed, how to start and stop that server
what is it called? dhcp3 maybe? dhcpd3?
that is the package, is that also the init script?
no init scrip with dhcpd or squid TAB is not working, not completing the word
are you sure they are installed?
yes, squid is running and dhcpd also
squid seems to point to upstart...
